reviews.sentence: Ideal Business Stay. Wonderful stay overall. Convenient location. Great customer service. Clean and up to date guest rooms and facilities. Friendly staff. Responsive management. Food selection is delicious with wide variety. Beautiful property.

Weekend Stay. Great staff and room accommodations. Pool service was great on Saturday and morning coffee the best. We arrived late and the 4 star restaurant served up a great light meal for us after a long day on the road.

First time at Omni. Excellent service beautiful hotel and great room. Top notch. Nice location but you have to take the hotel shuttle or a taxi to visit local restaurants and stores because it is not within walking distance.
Great service and clean rooms.

Great Get A Way. This Omni property is one of our favorites due to the location and value in staying here. The property is always well managed and very clean. Service is great and food is always excellent. Select Guest program is an added extra perk especially the morning coffee delivery.

A Sheer Pleasure. While staying at the Omni Hotel all of my experiences with staff were engaging professional courteous and friendly. I opted to have the extended check out time which allowed me to attend my conference take a break and return to my room without feeling rushed. The food at Noe Grill was exceptional flavorful and made to order. Everyone was polite and friendly. The ambiance was relaxing and it was indeed a get away experience at the Hotel.

Honeymoon stay. The hotel and the staff are very prompt and will go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. They even provided us with a complimentary honeymoon treat in our room. Bell man was not available to assist with our baggage and they do charge for parking but other than these two complaints the stay was great and would overall recommend.
Beautiful rooms and friendly staff.

Wonderful Hotel. I stayed at the Omni three nights for a professional conference and had an excellent stay. My room was very comfortable and immaculate service was flawless. The furnishings and decor are beautiful and well maintained. We ate at both on site restaurants and the food was fresh and tasty and waitstaf was very attentive. We used the free shuttle twice to get to restaurants nearby and the drivers were friendly and helpful. All in all I was impressed and would certainly recommend Omni Galleria to anyone.

Very nice location ambiance and facilities. My wife and I attended a wedding reception here and could not have been more satisfied with the service and quality. The food was excellent as well. I would recommend staying here for business or pleasure.

Best experience ever. I ’ve stayed at the Omni Hotel in Dallas Texas before but my experience at the Houston location was by far the best experience yet. Mr Curtis Petaway truly went above and beyond to ensure my stay was a memorable one. Not only did he see to it that my wife booked for a deep tissue massage but somehow he timed the delivery and setup of apple cider and chocolate covered strawberries to our room minutes before our return from dinner that evening. Mr Petaway stayed in constant communication with me making sure that everything was just as he stated. The hotel staff was extremely polite and helpful and saw to it that each time we left the hotel my car was waiting outside for us with the air conditioner set “. just right”. I think they may have even washed the car too. LOL. But all in all Mr Petaway truly exudes professionalism and was very accommodating making our stay an anniversary to remember.
Room service food was not very good but pretty expensive. Had to be called back for room service in the morning because they were no picking up.

Horrible Experience. Worst hotel everand I ’ve stayed on MANY. Service aspect just sucks to put it nicely. Do not care to ever return. So many little things that could have been done. 3 nights not had cleaning service yet. Grabbed fresh towels off of passing cart. Used towels only picked up when I got ticked off and threw them in the hallway along with trash. AWFUL. I could go on. 40 Christmas gift lost at front desk. ”we are reviewing video ”. UGH.
I did not like my room location and the staff was not responsive enough.

Horrible Hotel. The hotel was closed after Hurricane Harvey and reopened after extensive repairs. Lobby looks great lots of reviews likely from before it closed. It reopened recently but they left the old rooms mostly as is smelly fraying carpets tired rooms etc. Worst though is the service. Omni Hotels Management. This Hotel is blighting your reputation. I am a business traveler. My company has sponsored several events here last few months. First one hot water problems made people late and grouchy to breakfast meetings. Food was poor. And service was very poor I left a breakfast menu selection outside my door before 9PM. They never picked it up overnight so no coffee at 7AM for when I ordered it delivered. They then took more than half hour for them to get me a simple pot of hot coffee but forgot the milk i ordered so took another half hour. Also no decent coffee shop in hotel. And espresso machine is only operated between certain hours no earlier than 6AM. Second business trip just today the restaurant is closed so they are serving people dinner in the lobby with only one wait person on staff for the lobby bar. As hotel is a bit isolated and none within easy walking distance you are forced to eat here when on business. So comedy of errors trying to order get your food. meanwhile the restaurant sits dark and bar area and lobby where there are tables to eat are overcrowded because everyone is in same boat stuck at the hotel for dinner. Bartender and manager is overwhelmed doing their best but not able to do much. For the first meeting incidentally we did an employee survey not surprisingly they recommended we not host events here. I will recommend to our corporate events person that we no longer hold events at Omni.

Does the Omni brand a disservice. I had a great experience I actually planned on leaving a 5 star review until tonight. The bar would not let my friends aunt who is over 50 in. She bought out the bar her card was on file but since she did n’t have her ID present she was not let in. I understand if someone under the age of 30 was n’t let in without ID however this was not the case. Her card was on file as the master tab so how could they be comfortable charging her for everyone ’s drinks not just hers. Also the property is outdated the rooms are comfortable but clearly need to be updated. If you ’re looking for a good hotel in Houston there ’s other options. Do not choose Omni because the brand is familiar the service and atmosphere do not meet the standard.

The front desk staff during my stay was fantastic. It started off a little rocky as I was standing in what I thought was the line to check in when someone walked up and stood to the left of me. When a staff member walked up instead of asking who was next he asked the person person whom had just walked up after me if he could help him. Because there was no designated space to wait for the next available staff member the staff member should have inquired as to who was next in line. However the staff members on duty during my remaining 8day stay were absolutely WONDERFUL. Could not have asked for a better experience.

We are surprised to see so many good reviews for this place. Stayed there this week on 820 with another sales rep that I work with. The entire place smelt so bad. Thought it was just the lobby. It smelt horrible in our room the gym the spa and both bars. The cocktail lounge had the musty smell as well and they were trying to mask the smell with some type of air freshener. Cheese board at the bar was just terrible. Our rooms did not provide any water bottles at all. We do n’t care if we have to pay for them or not but no water bottles in the room. We had to also ask for additional coffee that was never brought up. We called the front desk 3 times about it and they acted like someone was on their way with more keurig cups. We had to go downstairs ourselves and there were several employees surrounding the front desk chit chatting and cutting up. Would not advise staying at this hotel.

Highly recommend. Room rates are great pool is very nice room is spacious and clean. They make sure you feel very comfortable. My keycard would not work there was a phone located on the floor 9th. I was on I called down to the desk and someone was up in less than 2 minutes with new cards to let me in my room.

NYE party. Gatsby theme for year 2020. I love the Omni hotel. However the NYE event was not managed well. We bought VIP tickets expecting faster service and finger foods. We never once was served food. We eventually had to go downstairs and order from the restaurant. And getting a drink meant waiting atleast 20min in line for every drink. Other than that i ve always loved the Omni hotel. They just should not have scamed people on VIP tickets for NYE event.
